description: Erection of a two-storey rear extension to create a duplex apartment at third and fourth floor levels.
decision_conditions: The proposed development would represent an incongruous design that would not relate well to the host building or the immediate surrounding area, thereby conflicting with policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant has failed to demonstrate on the balance of probabilities, that the proposed dormer extension would be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse, in conflict with Paragraph B3.(a) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Please provide existing and proposed roof plans at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing a scale bar, showing the outline of entire property not just part and showing dimensions of proposed work.The submitted roof plans do not have a scale bar.
